body.p: To whom this shall come I am personally acquainted with John J Pursley and have been for about two & a half years He has demeaned himself well I have been impressed with his candid & frank manner from my Knowledge of him and what I have heard of the case again^st^ him I believe he ought to be released I believe him to be an honorable and clever gentleman he has married a worthy Lady of this county and his family relations are amongst the most Substantial in Clark County I hope the case against him will be dismissed
